title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Strategies to Reduce Boredom for English Teachers in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: When utilizing blended learning tools, learners can analyze factors (F1–F5) that induce boredom.
Learners can propose at least three creative lesson design plans integrating digital content and offline activities.
Based on formative assessment data, learners can develop strategies to improve class participation by over 15%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
